banish.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to not allow someone or something to stay in a particular place
banish.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I was banished to a distant corridor.
banish.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to send someone away permanently from their country or the area where they live, especially as an official punishment
banish.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to try to stop thinking about something or someone
banish.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: They tried to banish the memory from their minds.
